author: iSazonov
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

We could consider https://github.com/TomaszRewak/C-sharp-console-gui-framework as output layer for PowerShell Core to get: 
- Coloring
- Progress bar like Windows PowerShell on Unix-es
- Alternatives graphical cmdlets like Show-Command and Show-GridView
- clickable Help
- and more, more, more

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

I was very surprised to see that ConsoleGU size is very small.
Currently we have a console implementation internally in PowerShell Core so integration with ConsoleGU does not have to be complicated.

/cc @SteveL-MSFT @daxian-dbw for information.
